detail_desc: Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the hips and a tiered skirt.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Cropped top in a fine waffle knit with narrow shoulder straps, a gentle V-neck, decorative buttons and gathers at the top, and an overlocked hem.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.

Platform espadrille sandals in grained imitation leather with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable, elasticated heel strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and a braided jute trim around the soles.
Thin bomber jacket in patterned satin with a small, ribbed stand-up collar containing glittery threads and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Chiffon lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline, a gathered seam at the hips and a flare to the hem.
Wide blouse in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck, a yoke at the front and long sleeves.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a jacquard-knit motif, wrapover front with buttons at the top, and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Shorts in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.

Shirt dress in softly draping twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets, flap front pockets, slightly wider sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a detachable belt at the waist. Unlined.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a cutaway collar, classic front, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a turn-down collar, classic front with press-studs and a yoke at the front and back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable mesh with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and back pockets. Adjustable, elasticated waist in sizes 8-12Y.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Soft, non-wired, lace triangle bra with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a scalloped grandad collar and buttons at the top with a scalloped button band. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side and flared skirt. Unlined.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
3/4-length leggings in cotton jersey with a wide waist panel.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long kaftan in patterned chiffon with open sides and a button on each side.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.

Lightweight jacket in windproof functional fabric made from recycled polyamide. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed zip and an elastic drawstring at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Tops with short sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Wide, sleeveless dress in softly draping jersey. Unlined.
Sleeveless, double-layered top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow double shoulder straps and a racer back.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist with pleats and a detachable belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and legs with creases.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Boxy, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a stand-up collar, a visible zip at the front and long sleeves.
Jacket in patterned, lightweight stretch twill with a collar and press-studs down the front. Fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.

Trousers in a cotton weave. High paper bag waist with pleats at the front, covered elastication at the back and a tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, front pockets and wide, gently tapered, loose-fitting legs with flap pockets.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Sandals with adjustable hook and loop straps across the foot. Suede linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and high-cut back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft leather with a high waist with concealed elastication and a zip in one side. Slim legs with a gentle flare to the hem and a seam above the knee.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and drawstring at the top. Kangaroo pocket, slightly dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, V-neck cardigan in a rib-knit cotton blend with short sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the waist.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy plumeti weave with a V-neck, frilled shoulder straps and long sleeves. Flounces with an embroidered trim at the front, and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Double-layered hat in ribbed cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Top in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and flounces at the top.

Baseball jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric, a ribbed stand-up collar and an appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Poncho in a jacquard-weave viscose and nylon blend with a V-neck at the front and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Fringed hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and slits in the sides with ties. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with three printed pairs. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the waist and bum. Adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Gathers at the sides, wide ties to define the waist, and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Ankle-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel at the top to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top with a wide neckline.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening at the front and a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with buttons at the top. Long sleeves with a frill trim on the shoulders and elastication with decorative ties at the cuffs. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce at the hem. Jersey underskirt.
Padded jacket with a lined hood, padded stand-up collar, zip down the front and diagonal front pockets. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a glittery pattern. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.

Kangol x H&M. Knee-length, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood, two-way zip down the front and welt pockets at the top. Long sleeves, one with the Kangol logo at the top, and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, patch front pockets, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
V-neck body in microfibre with lace sections. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
